thread.title: Brie Larson refuses to applaud Casey Affleck at Academy Awards
thread.title_full: Brie Larson refuses to applaud Casey Affleck at Academy Awards

author: Marialuisa Rincon
title: Brie Larson refuses to applaud Casey Affleck at Academy Awards
text:
Brie Larson refuses to applaud Casey Affleck at Academy Awards Houston Chronicle 11 hrs ago Marialuisa Rincon It didn't take long for Twitter users to notice Brie Larson's unenthusiastic reaction to presenting Casey Affleck's Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in "Manchester by the Sea."
The 27-year-old, who won the Oscar for Best Actress last year for her portrayal of a sexual assault survivor in Room, refused to clap for Affleck, who was accused of sexual harassment in 2010 by two colleagues.
The women, a producer and a cinematographer that worked with Affleck on the film I'm Still Standing, filed separate lawsuits against him citing, among other allegations, "unwelcome physical advances." One of the women said Affleck snuck into her bed in the middle of the night to find him "caressing her back." Â© Christopher Polk/Getty Images Actor Casey Affleck (R) accepts the Best Actor award for 'Manchester by the Sea' from presenter Brie Larson onstage onstagee during the 89th Annual Academy Awards at Hollywood & Highland Center on February 26, 2017 in Hollywood, California.
Affleck denied the allegations and settled the two lawsuits out of court.
Still, many people on social media spoke out against Affleck's win.
Casey Affleck should not have won. People who commit sexual harassment should lose their jobs, not be celebrated with honor and prestige.
â€” Feminist Frequency (@femfreq) February 27, 2017
i hate how abusers like casey affleck, johnny depp, woody allen etc continue to win awards and have a successful career this has to stop
â€” laura (@RAJAGEMINlS) February 27, 2017
Happy that "Moonlight" won.
Not so happy that men can sexually assault and abuse women and keep being honored. #MelGibson #CaseyAffleck
â€” Charles Clymer (@cmclymer) February 27, 2017
Casey Affleck won Best Actor.
Donald Trump is president.
Tell me again how sexual assault charges can "ruin" a man's career. ðŸ˜’
â€” Allie Beauregard (@AllieBeauregard) February 27, 2017
All award season Brie Larson, who starred in a movie about sexual assault, had to present Casey Affleck all his awards. pic.twitter.com/L2WbQvSJNv
â€” Marnie (@ChrnclsOfMarnia) February 27, 2017
It's the second time in a month that Larson presented Affleck with an award. At the Golden Globe Awards in January, Larson similarly made no move to hug Affleck after presenting him with the Golden Globe for Best Actor.
